15. 모니터링

15.1 모니터링 중요성​

모니터링은 애플리케이션의 안정성과 성능을 유지하는 데 필수적인 요소입니다. 효과적인 모니터링 시스템은 문제를 조기에 발견하고, 시스템의 건강 상태를 파악하며, 사용자 경험을 개선하는 데 도움을 줍니다.

모니터링이 필요한 이유​

/**
 * 모니터링의 핵심 가치
 *
 * 1. 문제 조기 발견
 *    - 장애가 발생하기 전에 징후 감지
 *    - 성능 저하 즉시 파악
 *    - 리소스 부족 예측
 *
 * 2. 신속한 대응
 *    - 실시간 알림을 통한 빠른 대응
 *    - 문제의 근본 원인 분석
 *    - 장애 복구 시간 단축
 *
 * 3. 데이터 기반 의사결정
 *    - 트래픽 패턴 분석
 *    - 사용자 행동 이해
 *    - 인프라 확장 계획 수립
 *
 * 4. 사용자 경험 개선
 *    - 응답 시간 최적화
 *    - 에러율 감소
 *    - 가용성 향상
 */

모니터링 계층​

// src/monitoring/layers.ts

export enum MonitoringLayer {
  INFRASTRUCTURE = 'infrastructure',  // 인프라 계층
  APPLICATION = 'application',        // 애플리케이션 계층
  BUSINESS = 'business',             // 비즈니스 계층
  USER = 'user'                      // 사용자 경험 계층
}

export interface MonitoringStrategy {
  layer: MonitoringLayer;
  metrics: string[];
  tools: string[];
  alertThresholds: Record<string, number>;
}

export const MONITORING_STRATEGIES: MonitoringStrategy[] = [
  {
    layer: MonitoringLayer.INFRASTRUCTURE,
    metrics: ['cpu_usage', 'memory_usage', 'disk_io', 'network_traffic'],
    tools: ['Prometheus', 'Node Exporter'],
    alertThresholds: {
      cpu_usage: 80,
      memory_usage: 85,
      disk_usage: 90
    }
  },
  {
    layer: MonitoringLayer.APPLICATION,
    metrics: ['request_rate', 'error_rate', 'response_time', 'throughput'],
    tools: ['Prometheus', 'Grafana', 'APM'],
    alertThresholds: {
      error_rate: 5,
      response_time_p95: 1000,
      response_time_p99: 2000
    }
  },
  {
    layer: MonitoringLayer.BUSINESS,
    metrics: ['conversion_rate', 'user_signups', 'revenue', 'transactions'],
    tools: ['Custom Dashboards', 'Analytics'],
    alertThresholds: {
      conversion_rate_drop: 20,
      transaction_failure_rate: 1
    }
  },
  {
    layer: MonitoringLayer.USER,
    metrics: ['page_load_time', 'time_to_interactive', 'cumulative_layout_shift'],
    tools: ['Real User Monitoring', 'Google Analytics'],
    alertThresholds: {
      page_load_time_p75: 3000,
      time_to_interactive: 5000
    }
  }
];

모니터링 Best Practices​

// src/monitoring/best-practices.ts

export class MonitoringBestPractices {
  // 1. The Four Golden Signals (Google SRE)
  static readonly GOLDEN_SIGNALS = {
    latency: 'How long it takes to service a request',
    traffic: 'How much demand is placed on the system',
    errors: 'The rate of requests that fail',
    saturation: 'How "full" the service is'
  };

  // 2. RED Method (for request-driven services)
  static readonly RED_METHOD = {
    rate: 'Number of requests per second',
    errors: 'Number of failed requests per second',
    duration: 'Time taken to process requests'
  };

  // 3. USE Method (for resources)
  static readonly USE_METHOD = {
    utilization: 'Average time the resource is busy',
    saturation: 'Degree of queued work',
    errors: 'Count of error events'
  };

  // 실용적인 가이드라인
  static getGuidelines(): string[] {
    return [
      '의미 있는 메트릭만 수집하라',
      '알림은 실행 가능한 것만 설정하라',
      '대시보드는 간결하게 유지하라',
      '로그는 구조화하여 저장하라',
      '메트릭에는 적절한 레이블을 붙여라',
      '정기적으로 모니터링 시스템을 점검하라',
      'SLO(Service Level Objective)를 정의하라',
      '알림 피로(Alert Fatigue)를 방지하라'
    ];
  }
}

15.2 애플리케이션 로그​

구조화된 로그는 문제 해결과 시스템 분석의 핵심입니다.

로거 설정​

// src/utils/logger.ts

import winston from 'winston';
import DailyRotateFile from 'winston-daily-rotate-file';

export enum LogLevel {
  ERROR = 'error',
  WARN = 'warn',
  INFO = 'info',
  HTTP = 'http',
  DEBUG = 'debug'
}

export interface LogContext {
  requestId?: string;
  userId?: string;
  action?: string;
  resource?: string;
  metadata?: Record<string, any>;
}

class Logger {
  private logger: winston.Logger;

  constructor() {
    this.logger = winston.createLogger({
      level: process.env.LOG_LEVEL || 'info',
      format: winston.format.combine(
        winston.format.timestamp({
          format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'
        }),
        winston.format.errors({ stack: true }),
        winston.format.splat(),
        winston.format.json()
      ),
      defaultMeta: {
        service: process.env.SERVICE_NAME || 'webapp',
        environment: process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development',
        version: process.env.APP_VERSION || '1.0.0'
      },
      transports: this.getTransports()
    });

    // 개발 환경에서는 콘솔에도 출력
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production') {
      this.logger.add(new winston.transports.Console({
        format: winston.format.combine(
          winston.format.colorize(),
          winston.format.simple()
        )
      }));
    }
  }

  private getTransports(): winston.transport[] {
    return [
      // 에러 로그 파일
      new DailyRotateFile({
        filename: 'logs/error-%DATE%.log',
        datePattern: 'YYYY-MM-DD',
        level: 'error',
        maxSize: '20m',
        maxFiles: '14d',
        zippedArchive: true
      }),
      // 결합 로그 파일
      new DailyRotateFile({
        filename: 'logs/combined-%DATE%.log',
        datePattern: 'YYYY-MM-DD',
        maxSize: '20m',
        maxFiles: '14d',
        zippedArchive: true
      })
    ];
  }

  error(message: string, context?: LogContext, error?: Error): void {
    this.logger.error(message, {
      ...context,
      error: error ? {
        message: error.message,
        stack: error.stack,
        name: error.name
      } : undefined
    });
  }

  warn(message: string, context?: LogContext): void {
    this.logger.warn(message, context);
  }

  info(message: string, context?: LogContext): void {
    this.logger.info(message, context);
  }

  http(message: string, context?: LogContext): void {
    this.logger.http(message, context);
  }

  debug(message: string, context?: LogContext): void {
    this.logger.debug(message, context);
  }

  // 구조화된 로그 메서드
  logRequest(req: any, res: any, duration: number): void {
    this.http('HTTP Request', {
      requestId: req.id,
      userId: req.user?.id,
      action: 'http_request',
      metadata: {
        method: req.method,
        url: req.url,
        statusCode: res.statusCode,
        duration,
        userAgent: req.get('user-agent'),
        ip: req.ip
      }
    });
  }

  logDatabaseQuery(query: string, duration: number, context?: LogContext): void {
    this.debug('Database Query', {
      ...context,
      action: 'database_query',
      metadata: {
        query: query.substring(0, 200), // 쿼리 길이 제한
        duration
      }
    });
  }

  logBusinessEvent(event: string, context: LogContext): void {
    this.info(`Business Event: ${event}`, {
      ...context,
      action: 'business_event'
    });
  }
}

export const logger = new Logger();

Express 미들웨어 통합​

// src/middleware/logging.middleware.ts

import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';
import { logger } from '../utils/logger';

// 요청 ID 추가
export const requestIdMiddleware = (
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
): void => {
  req.id = req.get('X-Request-Id') || uuidv4();
  res.setHeader('X-Request-Id', req.id);
  next();
};

// HTTP 요청 로깅
export const httpLoggingMiddleware = (
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
): void => {
  const startTime = Date.now();

  // 응답 완료 시 로그 기록
  res.on('finish', () => {
    const duration = Date.now() - startTime;
    logger.logRequest(req, res, duration);
  });

  next();
};

// 에러 로깅 미들웨어
export const errorLoggingMiddleware = (
  error: Error,
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
): void => {
  logger.error('Unhandled Error', {
    requestId: req.id,
    userId: req.user?.id,
    action: 'error_handler',
    resource: req.url,
    metadata: {
      method: req.method,
      body: req.body,
      params: req.params,
      query: req.query
    }
  }, error);

  next(error);
};

비즈니스 로직 로깅​

// src/services/user.service.ts

import { logger } from '../utils/logger';

export class UserService {
  async createUser(userData: CreateUserDto): Promise<User> {
    const startTime = Date.now();

    try {
      logger.info('Creating new user', {
        action: 'user_create_start',
        metadata: { email: userData.email }
      });

      const user = await this.userRepository.create(userData);

      logger.logBusinessEvent('user_created', {
        userId: user.id,
        action: 'user_create_success',
        metadata: {
          duration: Date.now() - startTime,
          email: user.email,
          role: user.role
        }
      });

      return user;
    } catch (error) {
      logger.error('Failed to create user', {
        action: 'user_create_failed',
        metadata: {
          duration: Date.now() - startTime,
          email: userData.email
        }
      }, error);
      throw error;
    }
  }

  async loginUser(email: string, password: string): Promise<LoginResult> {
    logger.info('User login attempt', {
      action: 'user_login_attempt',
      metadata: { email }
    });

    try {
      const user = await this.authenticate(email, password);

      logger.logBusinessEvent('user_login_success', {
        userId: user.id,
        action: 'user_login_success',
        metadata: { email }
      });

      return { user, token: this.generateToken(user) };
    } catch (error) {
      logger.warn('User login failed', {
        action: 'user_login_failed',
        metadata: { email, reason: error.message }
      });
      throw error;
    }
  }
}

로그 분석 쿼리 예제​

# 특정 사용자의 활동 조회
cat logs/combined-*.log | jq 'select(.userId == "user123")'

# 에러율 계산 (최근 1시간)
cat logs/combined-*.log | \
  jq -r 'select(.timestamp > (now - 3600)) | .level' | \
  sort | uniq -c

# 느린 요청 찾기 (1초 이상)
cat logs/combined-*.log | \
  jq 'select(.metadata.duration > 1000) | {url: .metadata.url, duration: .metadata.duration}'

# 가장 많이 발생한 에러
cat logs/error-*.log | \
  jq -r '.error.message' | \
  sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -10

15.3 Prometheus 메트릭​

Prometheus는 시계열 데이터베이스로, 메트릭 수집과 쿼리에 특화되어 있습니다.

Prometheus 설정​

# prometheus.yml

global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s
  external_labels:
    cluster: 'production'
    environment: 'prod'

# 알림 규칙 파일
rule_files:
  - 'alerts/*.yml'

# Alertmanager 설정
alerting:
  alertmanagers:
    - static_configs:
        - targets:
            - 'alertmanager:9093'

# 스크랩 설정
scrape_configs:
  # Prometheus 자체 모니터링
  - job_name: 'prometheus'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['localhost:9090']

  # Node Exporter (시스템 메트릭)
  - job_name: 'node'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['node-exporter:9100']
        labels:
          instance: 'server-1'

  # 애플리케이션 메트릭
  - job_name: 'webapp'
    scrape_interval: 10s
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['webapp:3000']
        labels:
          app: 'webapp'
          version: '1.0.0'
    metric_relabel_configs:
      # 불필요한 메트릭 제외
      - source_labels: [__name__]
        regex: 'go_.*'
        action: drop

  # PostgreSQL Exporter
  - job_name: 'postgresql'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['postgres-exporter:9187']

  # Redis Exporter
  - job_name: 'redis'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['redis-exporter:9121']

  # Nginx Exporter
  - job_name: 'nginx'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['nginx-exporter:9113']

Node.js 메트릭 수집​

// src/monitoring/metrics.ts

import promClient from 'prom-client';
import { Request, Response } from 'express';

export class MetricsCollector {
  private register: promClient.Registry;

  // HTTP 메트릭
  private httpRequestDuration: promClient.Histogram;
  private httpRequestTotal: promClient.Counter;
  private httpRequestSize: promClient.Summary;
  private httpResponseSize: promClient.Summary;

  // 비즈니스 메트릭
  private activeUsers: promClient.Gauge;
  private userRegistrations: promClient.Counter;
  private ordersTotal: promClient.Counter;
  private orderValue: promClient.Histogram;

  // 시스템 메트릭
  private dbConnectionPool: promClient.Gauge;
  private cacheHitRate: promClient.Counter;
  private queueLength: promClient.Gauge;

  constructor() {
    this.register = new promClient.Registry();

    // 기본 메트릭 수집 (CPU, Memory 등)
    promClient.collectDefaultMetrics({
      register: this.register,
      prefix: 'webapp_',
      gcDurationBuckets: [0.001, 0.01, 0.1, 1, 2, 5]
    });

    this.initializeMetrics();
  }

  private initializeMetrics(): void {
    // HTTP 요청 지속 시간
    this.httpRequestDuration = new promClient.Histogram({
      name: 'http_request_duration_seconds',
      help: 'Duration of HTTP requests in seconds',
      labelNames: ['method', 'route', 'status_code'],
      buckets: [0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 2, 5, 10]
    });

    // HTTP 요청 총 개수
    this.httpRequestTotal = new promClient.Counter({
      name: 'http_requests_total',
      help: 'Total number of HTTP requests',
      labelNames: ['method', 'route', 'status_code']
    });

    // HTTP 요청 크기
    this.httpRequestSize = new promClient.Summary({
      name: 'http_request_size_bytes',
      help: 'Size of HTTP requests in bytes',
      labelNames: ['method', 'route'],
      percentiles: [0.5, 0.9, 0.95, 0.99]
    });

    // HTTP 응답 크기
    this.httpResponseSize = new promClient.Summary({
      name: 'http_response_size_bytes',
      help: 'Size of HTTP responses in bytes',
      labelNames: ['method', 'route'],
      percentiles: [0.5, 0.9, 0.95, 0.99]
    });

    // 활성 사용자 수
    this.activeUsers = new promClient.Gauge({
      name: 'active_users_total',
      help: 'Number of currently active users',
      labelNames: ['type']
    });

    // 사용자 등록 수
    this.userRegistrations = new promClient.Counter({
      name: 'user_registrations_total',
      help: 'Total number of user registrations',
      labelNames: ['source', 'plan']
    });

    // 주문 총 개수
    this.ordersTotal = new promClient.Counter({
      name: 'orders_total',
      help: 'Total number of orders',
      labelNames: ['status', 'payment_method']
    });

    // 주문 금액
    this.orderValue = new promClient.Histogram({
      name: 'order_value_dollars',
      help: 'Value of orders in dollars',
      labelNames: ['currency'],
      buckets: [10, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000]
    });

    // 데이터베이스 커넥션 풀
    this.dbConnectionPool = new promClient.Gauge({
      name: 'db_connection_pool',
      help: 'Database connection pool status',
      labelNames: ['state'] // active, idle, waiting
    });

    // 캐시 히트율
    this.cacheHitRate = new promClient.Counter({
      name: 'cache_operations_total',
      help: 'Total number of cache operations',
      labelNames: ['operation', 'result'] // get/set, hit/miss
    });

    // 큐 길이
    this.queueLength = new promClient.Gauge({
      name: 'queue_length',
      help: 'Number of items in queue',
      labelNames: ['queue_name']
    });

    // 레지스트리에 메트릭 등록
    this.register.registerMetric(this.httpRequestDuration);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.httpRequestTotal);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.httpRequestSize);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.httpResponseSize);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.activeUsers);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.userRegistrations);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.ordersTotal);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.orderValue);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.dbConnectionPool);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.cacheHitRate);
    this.register.registerMetric(this.queueLength);
  }

  // HTTP 메트릭 기록
  recordHttpRequest(
    method: string,
    route: string,
    statusCode: number,
    duration: number,
    requestSize?: number,
    responseSize?: number
  ): void {
    const labels = { method, route, status_code: statusCode.toString() };

    this.httpRequestDuration.observe(labels, duration / 1000);
    this.httpRequestTotal.inc(labels);

    if (requestSize) {
      this.httpRequestSize.observe({ method, route }, requestSize);
    }
    if (responseSize) {
      this.httpResponseSize.observe({ method, route }, responseSize);
    }
  }

  // 비즈니스 메트릭 기록
  recordUserRegistration(source: string, plan: string): void {
    this.userRegistrations.inc({ source, plan });
  }

  recordOrder(status: string, paymentMethod: string, value: number, currency: string): void {
    this.ordersTotal.inc({ status, payment_method: paymentMethod });
    this.orderValue.observe({ currency }, value);
  }

  setActiveUsers(count: number, type: string = 'total'): void {
    this.activeUsers.set({ type }, count);
  }

  // 시스템 메트릭 기록
  setDbConnectionPool(active: number, idle: number, waiting: number): void {
    this.dbConnectionPool.set({ state: 'active' }, active);
    this.dbConnectionPool.set({ state: 'idle' }, idle);
    this.dbConnectionPool.set({ state: 'waiting' }, waiting);
  }

  recordCacheOperation(operation: 'get' | 'set', result: 'hit' | 'miss' | 'success'): void {
    this.cacheHitRate.inc({ operation, result });
  }

  setQueueLength(queueName: string, length: number): void {
    this.queueLength.set({ queue_name: queueName }, length);
  }

  // 메트릭 엔드포인트
  async getMetrics(): Promise<string> {
    return this.register.metrics();
  }

  getContentType(): string {
    return this.register.contentType;
  }
}

export const metricsCollector = new MetricsCollector();

메트릭 미들웨어​

// src/middleware/metrics.middleware.ts

import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
import { metricsCollector } from '../monitoring/metrics';

export const metricsMiddleware = (
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
): void => {
  const startTime = Date.now();
  const requestSize = parseInt(req.get('content-length') || '0', 10);

  // 응답 완료 시 메트릭 기록
  res.on('finish', () => {
    const duration = Date.now() - startTime;
    const responseSize = parseInt(res.get('content-length') || '0', 10);

    // 라우트 정규화 (파라미터를 일반화)
    const route = req.route?.path || req.path;

    metricsCollector.recordHttpRequest(
      req.method,
      route,
      res.statusCode,
      duration,
      requestSize,
      responseSize
    );
  });

  next();
};

// 메트릭 엔드포인트
export const metricsEndpoint = async (
  req: Request,
  res: Response
): Promise<void> => {
  try {
    res.set('Content-Type', metricsCollector.getContentType());
    const metrics = await metricsCollector.getMetrics();
    res.send(metrics);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).send('Error collecting metrics');
  }
};

커스텀 메트릭 사용 예제​

// src/services/order.service.ts

import { metricsCollector } from '../monitoring/metrics';

export class OrderService {
  async createOrder(orderData: CreateOrderDto): Promise<Order> {
    try {
      const order = await this.orderRepository.create(orderData);

      // 주문 메트릭 기록
      metricsCollector.recordOrder(
        order.status,
        order.paymentMethod,
        order.totalAmount,
        order.currency
      );

      return order;
    } catch (error) {
      throw error;
    }
  }

  // 정기적으로 활성 사용자 수 업데이트
  @Cron('*/1 * * * *') // 매 1분마다
  async updateActiveUsersMetric(): Promise<void> {
    const activeCount = await this.userRepository.countActiveUsers();
    metricsCollector.setActiveUsers(activeCount);
  }
}

PromQL 쿼리 예제​

# HTTP 요청률 (초당 요청 수)
rate(http_requests_total[5m])

# 메서드별 요청률
sum(rate(http_requests_total[5m])) by (method)

# 에러율 (5xx 에러 비율)
sum(rate(http_requests_total{status_code=~"5.."}[5m])) /
sum(rate(http_requests_total[5m])) * 100

# P95 응답 시간
histogram_quantile(0.95,
  sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le, route)
)

# 평균 응답 시간 (라우트별)
avg(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum[5m]) /
    rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count[5m])) by (route)

# 가장 느린 엔드포인트 TOP 5
topk(5,
  avg(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum[5m]) /
      rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count[5m])) by (route)
)

# 활성 사용자 수 변화
delta(active_users_total[1h])

# 캐시 히트율
sum(rate(cache_operations_total{result="hit"}[5m])) /
sum(rate(cache_operations_total{operation="get"}[5m])) * 100

# 데이터베이스 커넥션 사용률
db_connection_pool{state="active"} /
(db_connection_pool{state="active"} + db_connection_pool{state="idle"}) * 100

TypeScript로 대시보드 생성​

// src/monitoring/grafana-dashboard.ts

interface Panel {
  id: number;
  title: string;
  type: string;
  gridPos: { x: number; y: number; w: number; h: number };
  targets: Array<{
    expr: string;
    legendFormat?: string;
    refId: string;
  }>;
}

export class GrafanaDashboardBuilder {
  private panels: Panel[] = [];
  private currentId = 1;

  addGraphPanel(
    title: string,
    queries: Array<{ expr: string; legend: string }>,
    position: { x: number; y: number; w: number; h: number }
  ): this {
    this.panels.push({
      id: this.currentId++,
      title,
      type: 'graph',
      gridPos: position,
      targets: queries.map((q, idx) => ({
        expr: q.expr,
        legendFormat: q.legend,
        refId: String.fromCharCode(65 + idx) // A, B, C, ...
      }))
    });
    return this;
  }

  addStatPanel(
    title: string,
    query: string,
    position: { x: number; y: number; w: number; h: number }
  ): this {
    this.panels.push({
      id: this.currentId++,
      title,
      type: 'stat',
      gridPos: position,
      targets: [{ expr: query, refId: 'A' }]
    });
    return this;
  }

  build(title: string): object {
    return {
      dashboard: {
        title,
        panels: this.panels,
        timezone: 'browser',
        schemaVersion: 16,
        version: 1,
        refresh: '10s'
      }
    };
  }
}

// 사용 예제
export function createApplicationDashboard(): object {
  const builder = new GrafanaDashboardBuilder();

  return builder
    .addGraphPanel(
      'Request Rate',
      [
        { expr: 'sum(rate(http_requests_total[5m])) by (method)', legend: '{{method}}' }
      ],
      { x: 0, y: 0, w: 12, h: 8 }
    )
    .addGraphPanel(
      'Response Time Percentiles',
      [
        {
          expr: 'histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le))',
          legend: 'P95'
        },
        {
          expr: 'histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le))',
          legend: 'P99'
        }
      ],
      { x: 12, y: 0, w: 12, h: 8 }
    )
    .addStatPanel(
      'Active Users',
      'active_users_total',
      { x: 0, y: 8, w: 6, h: 4 }
    )
    .build('Application Monitoring');
}

15.5 알림 설정​

적절한 알림 설정은 문제를 신속하게 감지하고 대응하는 데 필수적입니다.

Prometheus 알림 규칙​

# alerts/application.yml

groups:
  - name: application_alerts
    interval: 30s
    rules:
      # 높은 에러율
      - alert: HighErrorRate
        expr: |
          (sum(rate(http_requests_total{status_code=~"5.."}[5m]))
          / sum(rate(http_requests_total[5m]))) * 100 > 5
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: backend
        annotations:
          summary: "High error rate detected"
          description: "Error rate is {{ $value | humanize }}% (threshold: 5%)"
          dashboard: "http://grafana/d/app-monitoring"

      # 느린 응답 시간
      - alert: HighResponseTime
        expr: |
          histogram_quantile(0.95,
            sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le, route)
          ) > 2
        for: 10m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: backend
        annotations:
          summary: "High response time on {{ $labels.route }}"
          description: "P95 response time is {{ $value | humanize }}s (threshold: 2s)"

      # 낮은 캐시 히트율
      - alert: LowCacheHitRate
        expr: |
          (sum(rate(cache_operations_total{result="hit"}[5m]))
          / sum(rate(cache_operations_total{operation="get"}[5m]))) * 100 < 70
        for: 15m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: cache
        annotations:
          summary: "Low cache hit rate"
          description: "Cache hit rate is {{ $value | humanize }}% (threshold: 70%)"

      # 데이터베이스 커넥션 부족
      - alert: DatabaseConnectionPoolExhausted
        expr: |
          db_connection_pool{state="waiting"} > 10
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: database
        annotations:
          summary: "Database connection pool exhausted"
          description: "{{ $value }} connections are waiting"

      # 큐 지연
      - alert: QueueBacklog
        expr: |
          queue_length > 1000
        for: 10m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: queue
        annotations:
          summary: "Queue backlog on {{ $labels.queue_name }}"
          description: "Queue length is {{ $value }}"

      # 활성 사용자 급감
      - alert: ActiveUsersDropped
        expr: |
          (active_users_total - active_users_total offset 1h)
          / active_users_total offset 1h * 100 < -50
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: business
        annotations:
          summary: "Active users dropped significantly"
          description: "Active users dropped by {{ $value | humanize }}%"

  - name: infrastructure_alerts
    interval: 30s
    rules:
      # 높은 CPU 사용률
      - alert: HighCPUUsage
        expr: |
          100 - (avg by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m])) * 100) > 80
        for: 10m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "High CPU usage on {{ $labels.instance }}"
          description: "CPU usage is {{ $value | humanize }}%"

      # 높은 메모리 사용률
      - alert: HighMemoryUsage
        expr: |
          (1 - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes)) * 100 > 85
        for: 10m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "High memory usage on {{ $labels.instance }}"
          description: "Memory usage is {{ $value | humanize }}%"

      # 디스크 공간 부족
      - alert: DiskSpaceLow
        expr: |
          (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype!="tmpfs"}
          / node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype!="tmpfs"}) * 100 < 10
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "Low disk space on {{ $labels.instance }}"
          description: "Only {{ $value | humanize }}% disk space available"

      # 서비스 다운
      - alert: ServiceDown
        expr: up == 0
        for: 2m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "Service {{ $labels.job }} is down"
          description: "{{ $labels.instance }} has been down for more than 2 minutes"

Alertmanager 설정​

# alertmanager.yml

global:
  resolve_timeout: 5m
  slack_api_url: 'https://hooks.slack.com/services/YOUR/WEBHOOK/URL'

# 알림 템플릿
templates:
  - '/etc/alertmanager/templates/*.tmpl'

# 라우팅 규칙
route:
  # 기본 수신자
  receiver: 'team-notifications'

  # 그룹화 설정
  group_by: ['alertname', 'cluster', 'service']
  group_wait: 10s
  group_interval: 10s
  repeat_interval: 12h

  # 라우팅 규칙
  routes:
    # Critical 알림은 즉시 전송
    - match:
        severity: critical
      receiver: 'critical-alerts'
      group_wait: 0s
      repeat_interval: 5m
      continue: true

    # 인프라 관련 알림
    - match:
        component: infrastructure
      receiver: 'infrastructure-team'
      group_interval: 5m

    # 데이터베이스 관련 알림
    - match:
        component: database
      receiver: 'database-team'

    # 비즈니스 메트릭 알림
    - match:
        component: business
      receiver: 'product-team'

# 수신자 설정
receivers:
  - name: 'team-notifications'
    slack_configs:
      - channel: '#monitoring'
        title: 'Alert: {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'
        text: '{{ range .Alerts }}{{ .Annotations.description }}{{ end }}'
        send_resolved: true

  - name: 'critical-alerts'
    slack_configs:
      - channel: '#critical-alerts'
        title: 'CRITICAL: {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'
        text: '{{ range .Alerts }}{{ .Annotations.description }}{{ end }}'
        color: 'danger'
    pagerduty_configs:
      - service_key: 'YOUR_PAGERDUTY_KEY'
        description: '{{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'

  - name: 'infrastructure-team'
    email_configs:
      - to: 'infrastructure@company.com'
        headers:
          Subject: '[ALERT] {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'

  - name: 'database-team'
    email_configs:
      - to: 'database@company.com'
        headers:
          Subject: '[DB ALERT] {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'

  - name: 'product-team'
    slack_configs:
      - channel: '#product'
        title: 'Business Metric Alert: {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}'

# 억제 규칙 (특정 알림이 발생하면 다른 알림 억제)
inhibit_rules:
  # 서비스가 다운되면 다른 경고 억제
  - source_match:
      severity: 'critical'
      alertname: 'ServiceDown'
    target_match:
      severity: 'warning'
    equal: ['instance']

  # Critical 알림이 있으면 Warning 억제
  - source_match:
      severity: 'critical'
    target_match:
      severity: 'warning'
    equal: ['alertname', 'instance']

알림 템플릿​

{{/* slack.tmpl */}}

{{ define "slack.title" }}
[{{ .Status | toUpper }}{{ if eq .Status "firing" }}:{{ .Alerts.Firing | len }}{{ end }}] {{ .GroupLabels.alertname }}
{{ end }}

{{ define "slack.text" }}
{{ range .Alerts }}
*Alert:* {{ .Labels.alertname }}
*Severity:* {{ .Labels.severity }}
*Summary:* {{ .Annotations.summary }}
*Description:* {{ .Annotations.description }}
{{ if .Annotations.dashboard }}
*Dashboard:* {{ .Annotations.dashboard }}
{{ end }}
*Details:*
{{ range .Labels.SortedPairs }}  • {{ .Name }}: `{{ .Value }}`
{{ end }}
{{ end }}
{{ end }}

{{ define "slack.color" }}
{{ if eq .Status "firing" }}
  {{ if eq .CommonLabels.severity "critical" }}danger{{ else }}warning{{ end }}
{{ else }}good{{ end }}
{{ end }}

애플리케이션 내 알림 통합​

// src/monitoring/alerting.ts

import axios from 'axios';

export interface Alert {
  name: string;
  severity: 'info' | 'warning' | 'critical';
  message: string;
  metadata?: Record<string, any>;
}

export class AlertManager {
  private slackWebhookUrl: string;
  private pagerDutyApiKey: string;

  constructor() {
    this.slackWebhookUrl = process.env.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL!;
    this.pagerDutyApiKey = process.env.PAGERDUTY_API_KEY!;
  }

  async sendAlert(alert: Alert): Promise<void> {
    // Slack 알림
    if (alert.severity === 'warning' || alert.severity === 'critical') {
      await this.sendSlackAlert(alert);
    }

    // PagerDuty 알림 (Critical만)
    if (alert.severity === 'critical') {
      await this.sendPagerDutyAlert(alert);
    }

    // 로그에도 기록
    logger.warn('Alert sent', {
      action: 'alert_sent',
      metadata: alert
    });
  }

  private async sendSlackAlert(alert: Alert): Promise<void> {
    const color = alert.severity === 'critical' ? 'danger' : 'warning';

    try {
      await axios.post(this.slackWebhookUrl, {
        attachments: [
          {
            color,
            title: `${alert.severity.toUpperCase()}: ${alert.name}`,
            text: alert.message,
            fields: Object.entries(alert.metadata || {}).map(([key, value]) => ({
              title: key,
              value: String(value),
              short: true
            })),
            footer: 'Application Monitoring',
            ts: Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)
          }
        ]
      });
    } catch (error) {
      logger.error('Failed to send Slack alert', {}, error);
    }
  }

  private async sendPagerDutyAlert(alert: Alert): Promise<void> {
    try {
      await axios.post(
        'https://events.pagerduty.com/v2/enqueue',
        {
          routing_key: this.pagerDutyApiKey,
          event_action: 'trigger',
          payload: {
            summary: alert.message,
            severity: alert.severity,
            source: 'webapp',
            custom_details: alert.metadata
          }
        }
      );
    } catch (error) {
      logger.error('Failed to send PagerDuty alert', {}, error);
    }
  }

  // 비즈니스 로직에서 사용할 헬퍼 메서드
  async alertHighErrorRate(errorRate: number): Promise<void> {
    await this.sendAlert({
      name: 'High Error Rate',
      severity: errorRate > 10 ? 'critical' : 'warning',
      message: `Error rate is ${errorRate.toFixed(2)}%`,
      metadata: { errorRate, threshold: 5 }
    });
  }

  async alertDatabaseConnectionIssue(waitingConnections: number): Promise<void> {
    await this.sendAlert({
      name: 'Database Connection Pool Issue',
      severity: 'critical',
      message: `${waitingConnections} connections waiting in pool`,
      metadata: { waitingConnections }
    });
  }
}

export const alertManager = new AlertManager();

15.6 APM (Application Performance Monitoring)​

APM 도구는 애플리케이션의 성능을 심층적으로 분석합니다.

New Relic 통합​

// src/monitoring/newrelic.ts

import newrelic from 'newrelic';

export class NewRelicAPM {
  // 커스텀 트랜잭션
  recordCustomTransaction(name: string, handler: () => Promise<any>): Promise<any> {
    return newrelic.startWebTransaction(name, async () => {
      try {
        return await handler();
      } catch (error) {
        newrelic.noticeError(error);
        throw error;
      }
    });
  }

  // 커스텀 메트릭
  recordCustomMetric(name: string, value: number): void {
    newrelic.recordMetric(name, value);
  }

  // 커스텀 이벤트
  recordCustomEvent(eventType: string, attributes: Record<string, any>): void {
    newrelic.recordCustomEvent(eventType, attributes);
  }

  // 사용자 추적
  setUserContext(userId: string, attributes?: Record<string, any>): void {
    newrelic.setUserId(userId);
    if (attributes) {
      Object.entries(attributes).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        newrelic.addCustomAttribute(key, value);
      });
    }
  }

  // 외부 서비스 호출 추적
  async recordExternalCall<T>(
    host: string,
    operation: string,
    handler: () => Promise<T>
  ): Promise<T> {
    const segment = newrelic.startSegment(operation, true, () => {
      return handler();
    });

    return segment;
  }
}

export const newRelicAPM = new NewRelicAPM();
// newrelic.js (설정 파일)

'use strict';

exports.config = {
  app_name: ['WebApp Production'],
  license_key: process.env.NEW_RELIC_LICENSE_KEY,
  logging: {
    level: 'info'
  },

  // 트랜잭션 추적
  transaction_tracer: {
    enabled: true,
    transaction_threshold: 'apdex_f',
    record_sql: 'obfuscated',
    explain_threshold: 500
  },

  // 에러 수집
  error_collector: {
    enabled: true,
    ignore_status_codes: [404]
  },

  // 분산 추적
  distributed_tracing: {
    enabled: true
  },

  // 커스텀 인스트루먼테이션
  custom_insights_events: {
    enabled: true,
    max_samples_stored: 10000
  },

  // 느린 SQL 쿼리 추적
  slow_sql: {
    enabled: true
  }
};

Elastic APM 통합​

// src/monitoring/elastic-apm.ts

import apm from 'elastic-apm-node';

// APM 초기화
export const elasticAPM = apm.start({
  serviceName: 'webapp',
  serverUrl: process.env.ELASTIC_APM_SERVER_URL,
  secretToken: process.env.ELASTIC_APM_SECRET_TOKEN,
  environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,

  // 트랜잭션 샘플 비율 (1.0 = 100%)
  transactionSampleRate: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 0.1 : 1.0,

  // 트랜잭션 최대 길이
  transactionMaxSpans: 500,

  // 캡처할 요청 바디 크기
  captureBody: 'all',
  captureHeaders: true,

  // 분산 추적
  usePathAsTransactionName: true
});

export class ElasticAPMMonitoring {
  // 커스텀 트랜잭션
  startTransaction(name: string, type: string = 'custom'): any {
    return apm.startTransaction(name, type);
  }

  // 스팬 (트랜잭션 내 작업 단위)
  startSpan(name: string, type?: string): any {
    return apm.startSpan(name, type);
  }

  // 에러 캡처
  captureError(error: Error, customContext?: Record<string, any>): void {
    apm.captureError(error, {
      custom: customContext
    });
  }

  // 사용자 컨텍스트 설정
  setUserContext(user: { id: string; username?: string; email?: string }): void {
    apm.setUserContext(user);
  }

  // 커스텀 컨텍스트 설정
  setCustomContext(context: Record<string, any>): void {
    apm.setCustomContext(context);
  }

  // 레이블 추가
  addLabels(labels: Record<string, string | number | boolean>): void {
    apm.addLabels(labels);
  }

  // 데코레이터로 사용
  traced(name?: string) {
    return (target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) => {
      const originalMethod = descriptor.value;
      const spanName = name || `${target.constructor.name}.${propertyKey}`;

      descriptor.value = async function (...args: any[]) {
        const span = apm.startSpan(spanName);
        try {
          const result = await originalMethod.apply(this, args);
          span?.end();
          return result;
        } catch (error) {
          apm.captureError(error);
          span?.end();
          throw error;
        }
      };

      return descriptor;
    };
  }
}

export const elasticAPMMonitoring = new ElasticAPMMonitoring();

APM 사용 예제​

// src/services/payment.service.ts

import { elasticAPMMonitoring } from '../monitoring/elastic-apm';

export class PaymentService {
  @elasticAPMMonitoring.traced('PaymentService.processPayment')
  async processPayment(orderId: string, amount: number): Promise<Payment> {
    const span = elasticAPMMonitoring.startSpan('validate-payment', 'validation');

    try {
      // 결제 검증
      await this.validatePayment(orderId, amount);
      span.end();

      // 외부 결제 게이트웨이 호출
      const gatewaySpan = elasticAPMMonitoring.startSpan(
        'payment-gateway-call',
        'external.http'
      );

      try {
        const result = await this.callPaymentGateway(orderId, amount);
        gatewaySpan.addLabels({
          gateway: 'stripe',
          amount,
          currency: 'USD'
        });
        gatewaySpan.end();

        return result;
      } catch (error) {
        elasticAPMMonitoring.captureError(error, {
          orderId,
          amount,
          gateway: 'stripe'
        });
        throw error;
      }
    } catch (error) {
      elasticAPMMonitoring.captureError(error);
      throw error;
    }
  }
}

15.7 헬스체크​

헬스체크는 시스템의 상태를 확인하는 엔드포인트입니다.

헬스체크 구현​

// src/health/health-check.service.ts

export enum HealthStatus {
  UP = 'up',
  DOWN = 'down',
  DEGRADED = 'degraded'
}

export interface HealthIndicator {
  name: string;
  status: HealthStatus;
  details?: Record<string, any>;
  responseTime?: number;
}

export interface HealthCheckResult {
  status: HealthStatus;
  timestamp: Date;
  uptime: number;
  indicators: HealthIndicator[];
}

export class HealthCheckService {
  private startTime: Date = new Date();

  async check(): Promise<HealthCheckResult> {
    const indicators = await Promise.all([
      this.checkDatabase(),
      this.checkRedis(),
      this.checkExternalAPIs(),
      this.checkDiskSpace(),
      this.checkMemory()
    ]);

    // 전체 상태 결정
    const status = this.determineOverallStatus(indicators);

    return {
      status,
      timestamp: new Date(),
      uptime: Date.now() - this.startTime.getTime(),
      indicators
    };
  }

  // 데이터베이스 헬스체크
  private async checkDatabase(): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    const startTime = Date.now();

    try {
      await db.raw('SELECT 1');

      const poolInfo = db.client.pool;
      const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;

      return {
        name: 'database',
        status: responseTime < 1000 ? HealthStatus.UP : HealthStatus.DEGRADED,
        responseTime,
        details: {
          activeConnections: poolInfo.numUsed(),
          idleConnections: poolInfo.numFree(),
          totalConnections: poolInfo.size,
          maxConnections: poolInfo.max
        }
      };
    } catch (error) {
      return {
        name: 'database',
        status: HealthStatus.DOWN,
        details: { error: error.message }
      };
    }
  }

  // Redis 헬스체크
  private async checkRedis(): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    const startTime = Date.now();

    try {
      await redis.ping();
      const info = await redis.info();
      const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;

      return {
        name: 'redis',
        status: responseTime < 500 ? HealthStatus.UP : HealthStatus.DEGRADED,
        responseTime,
        details: {
          connectedClients: this.parseRedisInfo(info, 'connected_clients'),
          usedMemory: this.parseRedisInfo(info, 'used_memory_human'),
          uptime: this.parseRedisInfo(info, 'uptime_in_seconds')
        }
      };
    } catch (error) {
      return {
        name: 'redis',
        status: HealthStatus.DOWN,
        details: { error: error.message }
      };
    }
  }

  // 외부 API 헬스체크
  private async checkExternalAPIs(): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    const checks = await Promise.allSettled([
      this.checkAPI('payment-gateway', process.env.PAYMENT_API_URL + '/health'),
      this.checkAPI('email-service', process.env.EMAIL_API_URL + '/health'),
      this.checkAPI('sms-service', process.env.SMS_API_URL + '/health')
    ]);

    const results = checks.map((result, index) => {
      if (result.status === 'fulfilled') {
        return result.value;
      }
      return {
        name: ['payment-gateway', 'email-service', 'sms-service'][index],
        status: HealthStatus.DOWN
      };
    });

    const allUp = results.every(r => r.status === HealthStatus.UP);
    const someDown = results.some(r => r.status === HealthStatus.DOWN);

    return {
      name: 'external-apis',
      status: allUp ? HealthStatus.UP : someDown ? HealthStatus.DEGRADED : HealthStatus.DOWN,
      details: Object.fromEntries(results.map(r => [r.name, r.status]))
    };
  }

  // 디스크 공간 헬스체크
  private async checkDiskSpace(): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    try {
      const diskUsage = await checkDiskSpace('/');
      const usagePercent = ((diskUsage.size - diskUsage.free) / diskUsage.size) * 100;

      return {
        name: 'disk',
        status: usagePercent < 90 ? HealthStatus.UP : HealthStatus.DEGRADED,
        details: {
          totalGB: (diskUsage.size / (1024 ** 3)).toFixed(2),
          freeGB: (diskUsage.free / (1024 ** 3)).toFixed(2),
          usagePercent: usagePercent.toFixed(2)
        }
      };
    } catch (error) {
      return {
        name: 'disk',
        status: HealthStatus.DOWN,
        details: { error: error.message }
      };
    }
  }

  // 메모리 헬스체크
  private async checkMemory(): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    const memUsage = process.memoryUsage();
    const totalMem = os.totalmem();
    const freeMem = os.freemem();
    const usagePercent = ((totalMem - freeMem) / totalMem) * 100;

    return {
      name: 'memory',
      status: usagePercent < 85 ? HealthStatus.UP : HealthStatus.DEGRADED,
      details: {
        heapUsedMB: (memUsage.heapUsed / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2),
        heapTotalMB: (memUsage.heapTotal / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2),
        rssMB: (memUsage.rss / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2),
        systemUsagePercent: usagePercent.toFixed(2)
      }
    };
  }

  private async checkAPI(name: string, url: string): Promise<HealthIndicator> {
    const startTime = Date.now();
    try {
      const response = await axios.get(url, { timeout: 5000 });
      return {
        name,
        status: response.status === 200 ? HealthStatus.UP : HealthStatus.DEGRADED,
        responseTime: Date.now() - startTime
      };
    } catch (error) {
      return {
        name,
        status: HealthStatus.DOWN,
        responseTime: Date.now() - startTime
      };
    }
  }

  private determineOverallStatus(indicators: HealthIndicator[]): HealthStatus {
    const hasDown = indicators.some(i => i.status === HealthStatus.DOWN);
    const hasDegraded = indicators.some(i => i.status === HealthStatus.DEGRADED);

    if (hasDown) return HealthStatus.DOWN;
    if (hasDegraded) return HealthStatus.DEGRADED;
    return HealthStatus.UP;
  }

  private parseRedisInfo(info: string, key: string): string {
    const match = info.match(new RegExp(`${key}:(.+)`));
    return match ? match[1].trim() : 'N/A';
  }
}

export const healthCheckService = new HealthCheckService();

헬스체크 엔드포인트​

// src/controllers/health.controller.ts

import { Router, Request, Response } from 'express';
import { healthCheckService, HealthStatus } from '../health/health-check.service';

const router = Router();

// 전체 헬스체크 (상세 정보 포함)
router.get('/health', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const result = await healthCheckService.check();
    const statusCode = result.status === HealthStatus.UP ? 200 : 503;

    res.status(statusCode).json(result);
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(503).json({
      status: HealthStatus.DOWN,
      error: error.message
    });
  }
});

// 간단한 liveness probe (K8s용)
router.get('/health/live', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  res.status(200).json({ status: 'alive' });
});

// Readiness probe (K8s용)
router.get('/health/ready', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const result = await healthCheckService.check();

    if (result.status === HealthStatus.UP) {
      res.status(200).json({ status: 'ready' });
    } else {
      res.status(503).json({ status: 'not ready', details: result });
    }
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(503).json({ status: 'not ready', error: error.message });
  }
});

export default router;

Kubernetes 헬스체크 설정​

# k8s/deployment.yml

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webapp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: webapp
          image: webapp:latest
          ports:
            - containerPort: 3000

          # Liveness Probe (컨테이너가 살아있는지 확인)
          livenessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /health/live
              port: 3000
            initialDelaySeconds: 30
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
            failureThreshold: 3

          # Readiness Probe (트래픽을 받을 준비가 되었는지 확인)
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /health/ready
              port: 3000
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 5
            timeoutSeconds: 3
            failureThreshold: 3

          # Startup Probe (초기 시작 시간이 긴 경우)
          startupProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /health/live
              port: 3000
            initialDelaySeconds: 0
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 3
            failureThreshold: 30

15.8 에러 추적 (Sentry)​

Sentry는 실시간 에러 추적 및 모니터링 플랫폼입니다.

Sentry 설정​

// src/monitoring/sentry.ts

import * as Sentry from '@sentry/node';
import * as Tracing from '@sentry/tracing';
import { Express } from 'express';

export class SentryMonitoring {
  initialize(app: Express): void {
    Sentry.init({
      dsn: process.env.SENTRY_DSN,
      environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,
      release: `webapp@${process.env.APP_VERSION}`,

      // 성능 모니터링
      tracesSampleRate: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 0.1 : 1.0,

      // 프로파일링
      profilesSampleRate: 0.1,

      // 통합
      integrations: [
        new Sentry.Integrations.Http({ tracing: true }),
        new Tracing.Integrations.Express({ app }),
        new Tracing.Integrations.Postgres(),
        new Tracing.Integrations.Mongo(),
      ],

      // 에러 필터링
      beforeSend(event, hint) {
        // 특정 에러 무시
        const error = hint.originalException;
        if (error && error.message?.includes('ECONNREFUSED')) {
          return null;
        }

        // 민감한 정보 제거
        if (event.request) {
          delete event.request.cookies;
          if (event.request.headers) {
            delete event.request.headers.authorization;
          }
        }

        return event;
      },

      // 브레드크럼 필터링
      beforeBreadcrumb(breadcrumb, hint) {
        if (breadcrumb.category === 'console') {
          return null;
        }
        return breadcrumb;
      }
    });
  }

  // Express 미들웨어
  requestHandler(): any {
    return Sentry.Handlers.requestHandler({
      user: ['id', 'email', 'username'],
      ip: true,
      request: true,
      transaction: 'methodPath'
    });
  }

  tracingHandler(): any {
    return Sentry.Handlers.tracingHandler();
  }

  errorHandler(): any {
    return Sentry.Handlers.errorHandler({
      shouldHandleError(error) {
        // 4xx 에러는 Sentry에 보고하지 않음
        return error.status >= 500;
      }
    });
  }

  // 에러 캡처
  captureException(error: Error, context?: Sentry.CaptureContext): string {
    return Sentry.captureException(error, context);
  }

  // 메시지 캡처
  captureMessage(message: string, level: Sentry.SeverityLevel = 'info'): string {
    return Sentry.captureMessage(message, level);
  }

  // 사용자 컨텍스트 설정
  setUser(user: { id: string; email?: string; username?: string }): void {
    Sentry.setUser(user);
  }

  // 태그 설정
  setTag(key: string, value: string): void {
    Sentry.setTag(key, value);
  }

  // 컨텍스트 설정
  setContext(name: string, context: Record<string, any>): void {
    Sentry.setContext(name, context);
  }

  // 브레드크럼 추가
  addBreadcrumb(breadcrumb: Sentry.Breadcrumb): void {
    Sentry.addBreadcrumb(breadcrumb);
  }

  // 트랜잭션 시작
  startTransaction(context: Sentry.TransactionContext): Sentry.Transaction {
    return Sentry.startTransaction(context);
  }

  // 성능 모니터링
  async trace<T>(
    operation: string,
    handler: () => Promise<T>,
    data?: Record<string, any>
  ): Promise<T> {
    const transaction = Sentry.startTransaction({
      op: operation,
      name: operation,
      data
    });

    try {
      const result = await handler();
      transaction.setStatus('ok');
      return result;
    } catch (error) {
      transaction.setStatus('internal_error');
      throw error;
    } finally {
      transaction.finish();
    }
  }
}

export const sentry = new SentryMonitoring();

Express 통합​

// src/app.ts

import express from 'express';
import { sentry } from './monitoring/sentry';

const app = express();

// Sentry는 다른 미들웨어보다 먼저 초기화
sentry.initialize(app);

// Request handler는 첫 번째 미들웨어여야 함
app.use(sentry.requestHandler());

// Tracing handler는 request handler 다음에
app.use(sentry.tracingHandler());

// 일반 미들웨어
app.use(express.json());
app.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true }));

// 라우트
app.use('/api', routes);

// Error handler는 모든 미들웨어/라우트 뒤에
app.use(sentry.errorHandler());

// 커스텀 에러 핸들러
app.use((err, req, res, next) => {
  res.status(err.status || 500).json({
    error: {
      message: err.message,
      ...(process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && { stack: err.stack })
    }
  });
});

export default app;

비즈니스 로직에서 Sentry 사용​

// src/services/order.service.ts

import { sentry } from '../monitoring/sentry';

export class OrderService {
  async createOrder(userId: string, orderData: CreateOrderDto): Promise<Order> {
    // 사용자 컨텍스트 설정
    sentry.setUser({ id: userId });

    // 브레드크럼 추가
    sentry.addBreadcrumb({
      category: 'order',
      message: 'Creating new order',
      level: 'info',
      data: { items: orderData.items.length }
    });

    try {
      // 트랜잭션으로 성능 추적
      return await sentry.trace('order.create', async () => {
        const order = await this.orderRepository.create({
          userId,
          ...orderData
        });

        // 결제 처리
        const payment = await this.processPayment(order);

        // 재고 업데이트
        await this.updateInventory(order.items);

        return order;
      }, {
        userId,
        orderValue: orderData.totalAmount
      });
    } catch (error) {
      // 추가 컨텍스트와 함께 에러 캡처
      sentry.captureException(error, {
        tags: {
          operation: 'create_order',
          userId
        },
        contexts: {
          order: {
            items: orderData.items,
            total: orderData.totalAmount
          }
        }
      });
      throw error;
    }
  }

  async processPayment(order: Order): Promise<Payment> {
    const transaction = sentry.startTransaction({
      op: 'payment',
      name: 'Process Payment'
    });

    try {
      const span = transaction.startChild({
        op: 'http.client',
        description: 'Payment Gateway API Call'
      });

      const payment = await this.paymentGateway.charge({
        amount: order.totalAmount,
        currency: order.currency
      });

      span.finish();
      transaction.setStatus('ok');
      return payment;
    } catch (error) {
      transaction.setStatus('internal_error');

      // 결제 실패는 critical 레벨
      sentry.captureMessage(
        `Payment failed for order ${order.id}`,
        'error'
      );

      throw error;
    } finally {
      transaction.finish();
    }
  }
}

프론트엔드 Sentry 설정​

// frontend/src/monitoring/sentry.ts

import * as Sentry from '@sentry/react';
import { BrowserTracing } from '@sentry/tracing';

export function initializeSentry(): void {
  Sentry.init({
    dsn: process.env.REACT_APP_SENTRY_DSN,
    environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,
    release: `webapp-frontend@${process.env.REACT_APP_VERSION}`,

    integrations: [
      new BrowserTracing(),
      new Sentry.Replay({
        maskAllText: true,
        blockAllMedia: true
      })
    ],

    // 성능 모니터링
    tracesSampleRate: 0.1,

    // Session Replay
    replaysSessionSampleRate: 0.1,
    replaysOnErrorSampleRate: 1.0,

    beforeSend(event, hint) {
      // 개발 환경에서는 콘솔에 출력
      if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development') {
        console.error('Sentry Event:', event, hint);
      }
      return event;
    }
  });
}

// React 에러 바운더리
export const SentryErrorBoundary = Sentry.ErrorBoundary;

15.9 사용자 분석​

사용자 행동 분석은 제품 개선과 비즈니스 의사결정에 필수적입니다.

Google Analytics 통합​

// src/analytics/google-analytics.ts

import Analytics from 'analytics';
import googleAnalytics from '@analytics/google-analytics';

export const analytics = Analytics({
  app: 'webapp',
  plugins: [
    googleAnalytics({
      measurementIds: [process.env.GA_MEASUREMENT_ID!]
    })
  ]
});

export class GoogleAnalytics {
  // 페이지 뷰 추적
  trackPageView(path: string, title?: string): void {
    analytics.page({
      path,
      title
    });
  }

  // 이벤트 추적
  trackEvent(
    category: string,
    action: string,
    label?: string,
    value?: number
  ): void {
    analytics.track('event', {
      category,
      action,
      label,
      value
    });
  }

  // 사용자 속성 설정
  setUserProperties(properties: Record<string, any>): void {
    analytics.identify(properties.userId, properties);
  }

  // E-commerce 이벤트
  trackPurchase(transaction: {
    transactionId: string;
    revenue: number;
    tax?: number;
    shipping?: number;
    items: Array<{
      name: string;
      sku: string;
      price: number;
      quantity: number;
    }>;
  }): void {
    analytics.track('purchase', transaction);
  }

  // 커스텀 이벤트
  trackCustomEvent(eventName: string, properties?: Record<string, any>): void {
    analytics.track(eventName, properties);
  }
}

export const ga = new GoogleAnalytics();

Mixpanel 통합​

// src/analytics/mixpanel.ts

import mixpanel from 'mixpanel';

export class MixpanelAnalytics {
  private client: mixpanel.Mixpanel;

  constructor() {
    this.client = mixpanel.init(process.env.MIXPANEL_TOKEN!);
  }

  // 이벤트 추적
  track(userId: string, eventName: string, properties?: Record<string, any>): void {
    this.client.track(eventName, {
      distinct_id: userId,
      ...properties,
      time: Date.now(),
      $insert_id: this.generateInsertId(userId, eventName)
    });
  }

  // 사용자 프로필 설정
  setUserProfile(userId: string, properties: Record<string, any>): void {
    this.client.people.set(userId, {
      ...properties,
      $last_seen: new Date()
    });
  }

  // 사용자 프로필 업데이트
  incrementUserProperty(userId: string, property: string, value: number = 1): void {
    this.client.people.increment(userId, property, value);
  }

  // 매출 추적
  trackRevenue(userId: string, amount: number, properties?: Record<string, any>): void {
    this.client.people.track_charge(userId, amount, {
      $time: new Date(),
      ...properties
    });
  }

  // Funnel 분석을 위한 이벤트
  trackFunnelStep(
    userId: string,
    funnel: string,
    step: string,
    properties?: Record<string, any>
  ): void {
    this.track(userId, `${funnel} - ${step}`, {
      funnel,
      step,
      ...properties
    });
  }

  // A/B 테스트
  trackExperiment(
    userId: string,
    experimentName: string,
    variant: string,
    properties?: Record<string, any>
  ): void {
    this.track(userId, 'Experiment Viewed', {
      experiment_name: experimentName,
      variant,
      ...properties
    });
  }

  private generateInsertId(userId: string, eventName: string): string {
    return `${userId}-${eventName}-${Date.now()}`;
  }
}

export const mixpanel = new MixpanelAnalytics();

커스텀 분석 시스템​

// src/analytics/custom-analytics.ts

export interface AnalyticsEvent {
  userId?: string;
  sessionId: string;
  eventName: string;
  properties: Record<string, any>;
  timestamp: Date;
  userAgent?: string;
  ip?: string;
  referrer?: string;
}

export class CustomAnalytics {
  private eventQueue: AnalyticsEvent[] = [];
  private flushInterval: NodeJS.Timeout;

  constructor() {
    // 10초마다 이벤트 플러시
    this.flushInterval = setInterval(() => this.flush(), 10000);
  }

  // 이벤트 기록
  track(event: Omit<AnalyticsEvent, 'timestamp'>): void {
    this.eventQueue.push({
      ...event,
      timestamp: new Date()
    });

    // 큐가 100개 이상이면 즉시 플러시
    if (this.eventQueue.length >= 100) {
      this.flush();
    }
  }

  // 사용자 행동 추적
  trackUserAction(
    userId: string,
    sessionId: string,
    action: string,
    properties?: Record<string, any>
  ): void {
    this.track({
      userId,
      sessionId,
      eventName: `user.${action}`,
      properties: properties || {}
    });
  }

  // 페이지 뷰 추적
  trackPageView(
    userId: string | undefined,
    sessionId: string,
    path: string,
    properties?: Record<string, any>
  ): void {
    this.track({
      userId,
      sessionId,
      eventName: 'page.view',
      properties: {
        path,
        ...properties
      }
    });
  }

  // 클릭 추적
  trackClick(
    userId: string | undefined,
    sessionId: string,
    element: string,
    properties?: Record<string, any>
  ): void {
    this.track({
      userId,
      sessionId,
      eventName: 'click',
      properties: {
        element,
        ...properties
      }
    });
  }

  // 이벤트를 데이터베이스에 저장
  private async flush(): Promise<void> {
    if (this.eventQueue.length === 0) return;

    const events = [...this.eventQueue];
    this.eventQueue = [];

    try {
      // 배치로 데이터베이스에 저장
      await db('analytics_events').insert(events);

      // Kafka나 다른 스트림 처리 시스템으로 전송
      await this.sendToEventStream(events);
    } catch (error) {
      logger.error('Failed to flush analytics events', {}, error);
      // 실패한 이벤트는 다시 큐에 추가
      this.eventQueue.unshift(...events);
    }
  }

  private async sendToEventStream(events: AnalyticsEvent[]): Promise<void> {
    // Kafka, Kinesis, Pub/Sub 등으로 전송
    // 실시간 분석이나 데이터 웨어하우스로 전달
  }

  // 정리
  destroy(): void {
    clearInterval(this.flushInterval);
    this.flush();
  }
}

export const customAnalytics = new CustomAnalytics();

분석 미들웨어​

// src/middleware/analytics.middleware.ts

import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
import { customAnalytics } from '../analytics/custom-analytics';
import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';

export const analyticsMiddleware = (
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
): void => {
  // 세션 ID (쿠키에서 가져오거나 생성)
  const sessionId = req.cookies.session_id || uuidv4();
  if (!req.cookies.session_id) {
    res.cookie('session_id', sessionId, {
      maxAge: 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, // 30일
      httpOnly: true
    });
  }

  // 페이지 뷰 추적
  customAnalytics.trackPageView(
    req.user?.id,
    sessionId,
    req.path,
    {
      method: req.method,
      query: req.query,
      referrer: req.get('referrer'),
      userAgent: req.get('user-agent')
    }
  );

  next();
};

Web Vitals 수집​

// frontend/src/monitoring/web-vitals.ts

import { getCLS, getFID, getFCP, getLCP, getTTFB } from 'web-vitals';

export class WebVitalsMonitoring {
  initialize(): void {
    // Cumulative Layout Shift
    getCLS(this.sendToAnalytics);

    // First Input Delay
    getFID(this.sendToAnalytics);

    // First Contentful Paint
    getFCP(this.sendToAnalytics);

    // Largest Contentful Paint
    getLCP(this.sendToAnalytics);

    // Time to First Byte
    getTTFB(this.sendToAnalytics);
  }

  private sendToAnalytics(metric: any): void {
    const body = JSON.stringify({
      name: metric.name,
      value: metric.value,
      rating: metric.rating,
      delta: metric.delta,
      id: metric.id,
      navigationType: metric.navigationType,
      url: window.location.href,
      userAgent: navigator.userAgent
    });

    // Beacon API로 전송 (페이지 이탈 시에도 전송 보장)
    if (navigator.sendBeacon) {
      navigator.sendBeacon('/api/analytics/web-vitals', body);
    } else {
      fetch('/api/analytics/web-vitals', {
        body,
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        keepalive: true
      });
    }

    // Google Analytics로도 전송
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', metric.name, {
        value: Math.round(metric.value),
        event_category: 'Web Vitals',
        event_label: metric.id,
        non_interaction: true
      });
    }
  }
}

export const webVitals = new WebVitalsMonitoring();

백엔드 성능 모니터링​

// src/monitoring/performance.ts

export class PerformanceMonitor {
  private metrics: Map<string, number[]> = new Map();

  // 성능 측정
  measure<T>(name: string, fn: () => T): T {
    const start = performance.now();
    try {
      return fn();
    } finally {
      const duration = performance.now() - start;
      this.recordMetric(name, duration);
    }
  }

  // 비동기 성능 측정
  async measureAsync<T>(name: string, fn: () => Promise<T>): Promise<T> {
    const start = performance.now();
    try {
      return await fn();
    } finally {
      const duration = performance.now() - start;
      this.recordMetric(name, duration);
    }
  }

  // 메트릭 기록
  private recordMetric(name: string, duration: number): void {
    if (!this.metrics.has(name)) {
      this.metrics.set(name, []);
    }
    this.metrics.get(name)!.push(duration);

    // 100개 이상이면 오래된 것 제거
    const values = this.metrics.get(name)!;
    if (values.length > 100) {
      values.shift();
    }

    // Prometheus 메트릭 기록
    metricsCollector.recordCustomMetric(
      `performance_${name}_duration_ms`,
      duration
    );
  }

  // 통계 조회
  getStats(name: string): {
    count: number;
    avg: number;
    min: number;
    max: number;
    p50: number;
    p95: number;
    p99: number;
  } | null {
    const values = this.metrics.get(name);
    if (!values || values.length === 0) return null;

    const sorted = [...values].sort((a, b) => a - b);
    const sum = sorted.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0);

    return {
      count: sorted.length,
      avg: sum / sorted.length,
      min: sorted[0],
      max: sorted[sorted.length - 1],
      p50: this.percentile(sorted, 0.5),
      p95: this.percentile(sorted, 0.95),
      p99: this.percentile(sorted, 0.99)
    };
  }

  private percentile(sorted: number[], p: number): number {
    const index = Math.ceil(sorted.length * p) - 1;
    return sorted[index];
  }

  // 모든 통계 조회
  getAllStats(): Record<string, any> {
    const stats: Record<string, any> = {};
    for (const [name] of this.metrics) {
      stats[name] = this.getStats(name);
    }
    return stats;
  }
}

export const performanceMonitor = new PerformanceMonitor();

실습 2: 종합 모니터링 대시보드​

// src/monitoring/dashboard.controller.ts

import { Router, Request, Response } from 'express';
import { performanceMonitor } from './performance';
import { healthCheckService } from '../health/health-check.service';
import { metricsCollector } from './metrics';

const router = Router();

// 종합 대시보드 데이터
router.get('/dashboard', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const [health, performance, metrics] = await Promise.all([
      healthCheckService.check(),
      performanceMonitor.getAllStats(),
      getRealtimeMetrics()
    ]);

    res.json({
      health,
      performance,
      metrics,
      timestamp: new Date()
    });
  } catch (error) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
  }
});

// 실시간 메트릭
async function getRealtimeMetrics() {
  const memUsage = process.memoryUsage();
  const uptime = process.uptime();

  return {
    memory: {
      heapUsed: memUsage.heapUsed,
      heapTotal: memUsage.heapTotal,
      rss: memUsage.rss,
      external: memUsage.external
    },
    uptime,
    activeConnections: await getActiveConnections(),
    requestRate: await getRequestRate(),
    errorRate: await getErrorRate()
  };
}

async function getActiveConnections(): Promise<number> {
  const pool = db.client.pool;
  return pool.numUsed();
}

async function getRequestRate(): Promise<number> {
  // 최근 1분간 요청 수
  const metrics = await metricsCollector.getMetrics();
  // PromQL: rate(http_requests_total[1m])
  return 0; // 실제 구현 필요
}

async function getErrorRate(): Promise<number> {
  // 최근 1분간 에러율
  return 0; // 실제 구현 필요
}

export default router;

import { alertManager } from './alerting';

export class AlertTester {
  async testAllAlerts(): Promise<void> {
    console.log('Testing alert system...');

    // 1. 정보 알림 테스트
    await this.testInfoAlert();

    // 2. 경고 알림 테스트
    await this.testWarningAlert();

    // 3. 심각 알림 테스트 (주석 처리 - 실제로는 보내지 않음)
    // await this.testCriticalAlert();

    console.log('Alert tests completed');
  }

  private async testInfoAlert(): Promise<void> {
    await alertManager.sendAlert({
      name: 'Test Info Alert',
      severity: 'info',
      message: 'This is a test information alert',
      metadata: {
        test: true,
        timestamp: new Date()
      }
    });
  }

  private async testWarningAlert(): Promise<void> {
    await alertManager.sendAlert({
      name: 'Test Warning Alert',
      severity: 'warning',
      message: 'This is a test warning alert',
      metadata: {
        test: true,
        metric: 'response_time',
        value: 1500,
        threshold: 1000
      }
    });
  }

  private async testCriticalAlert(): Promise<void> {
    await alertManager.sendAlert({
      name: 'Test Critical Alert',
      severity: 'critical',
      message: 'This is a test critical alert - DO NOT PAGE',
      metadata: {
        test: true,
        service: 'test-service'
      }
    });
  }
}

실습 4: 성능 병목 지점 찾기​

// scripts/find-bottlenecks.ts

import { performanceMonitor } from '../src/monitoring/performance';

async function analyzePerformance(): Promise<void> {
  console.log('Analyzing performance bottlenecks...\n');

  const stats = performanceMonitor.getAllStats();
  const bottlenecks: Array<{ name: string; p95: number; avg: number }> = [];

  for (const [name, stat] of Object.entries(stats)) {
    if (stat && stat.p95 > 1000) { // 1초 이상
      bottlenecks.push({
        name,
        p95: stat.p95,
        avg: stat.avg
      });
    }
  }

  // P95 기준으로 정렬
  bottlenecks.sort((a, b) => b.p95 - a.p95);

  console.log('Performance Bottlenecks (P95 > 1000ms):\n');
  console.table(bottlenecks);

  // 권장사항 출력
  console.log('\nRecommendations:');
  bottlenecks.forEach((bottleneck, index) => {
    console.log(`${index + 1}. Optimize "${bottleneck.name}"`);
    console.log(`   - P95: ${bottleneck.p95.toFixed(2)}ms`);
    console.log(`   - Avg: ${bottleneck.avg.toFixed(2)}ms`);
    console.log(`   - Consider: caching, query optimization, or async processing\n`);
  });
}

analyzePerformance();

요약​

이 장에서는 웹 애플리케이션의 모니터링에 대해 다음 내용을 학습했습니다:

  1. 모니터링 중요성: 시스템의 건강 상태를 파악하고 문제를 조기에 발견
  2. 애플리케이션 로그: 구조화된 로그 수집 및 분석
  3. Prometheus 메트릭: 시계열 데이터 수집 및 PromQL 쿼리
  4. Grafana 대시보드: 메트릭 시각화 및 모니터링
  5. 알림 설정: Alertmanager를 통한 효과적인 알림 시스템
  6. APM: 애플리케이션 성능 심층 분석
  7. 헬스체크: 시스템 상태 확인 엔드포인트
  8. 에러 추적: Sentry를 통한 실시간 에러 모니터링
  9. 사용자 분석: Google Analytics, Mixpanel 등을 통한 사용자 행동 분석
  10. 성능 메트릭: Web Vitals 및 백엔드 성능 측정

효과적인 모니터링 시스템을 구축하면 시스템의 안정성과 성능을 지속적으로 개선할 수 있습니다.
